name: Magnet is a worse REZ
author: Silver Stone
notes: Magnets are probably the strongest deck for the ladder because of their speed and power. It has good match ups against all decks except Dinos. However, it still can win with an aggressive AMA play. Cosmic Cyclone is a great out to SSA decks and Brainwashing beam. If you have the 3rd powerfull rebirth play it instead of kurogane.
